column1: * 1934 - Author Diana Wynne Jones is born.
* 1975 - Mythcon 6 at wikipedia:Scripps College in wikipedia:Claremont
* 1981 - The twenty-fourth episode of the The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
* 1982 - Mythcon 13 at wikipedia:Chapman University in wikipedia:Orange
* 1984 - The Book of Lost Tales Part Two is published in the UK.
* 1992 - The first part of the Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series) of Farmer Giles of Ham is aired on BBC.

column2: a combination of Oxonmoot 1992 and Mythcon 23

column1: * 2002 - The Annotated Hobbit: Revised and Expanded Edition is published.
* 2008 - Mythcon 39 at wikipedia:Central Connecticut State University in wikipedia:New Britain

column2: The Tolkien Society conference at wikipedia:Loughborough University
